Public Remarks: TENANT IS MONTH TO MONTH & LEASE EXPIRES 3/31/22. This home has a great floor plan with a misting system, extra large covered patio, low maintenance yards, sparkling pool & waterfall all on an over sized lot just shy of a 1/4 acre.  There are two RV gates with concrete slab for your outdoor toys & access to the alley.  As you walk through the front door you will notice the brick fireplace directly in front of you with the dining area & kitchen to your right.  As you turn to the left you will notice the hallway, bedrooms & bathroom.  The master bedroom is very spacious with walk-in closets.   One closet may be converted into a master bathroom very easily.  Chandler school districts are ranked in the top ten for Public & Charter in Maricopa County.

Public Remarks: Beautiful updated home on a corner lot in Bridgeporte. Charming brick  family room fireplace, dry bar, beautiful tile floors, ceiling fans, soothing palette, & handsome engineered wood floors in the formal living/dining room. Spacious primary bedroom boasts a tile floor, patio access, large closet,  & a private en suite w/dual sinks.  French doors into the 4th bedroom or den!  Enjoy the backyard covered patio, sparkling pool, & low care landscape.  Close to 101,  shopping, dining, and  more.  Take a tour today & start packing!

Public Remarks: 72 Hour Home Sale!  Gorgeous 5 bedroom, 3 bath home in the amazing south Chandler community of Sun River! This beautiful home features a 3 car garage, RV gate, and beautiful desert landscaping in the front.  The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, tons of cabinet space, and granite counter tops. Adjacent to the kitchen is a formal dining area and there is a full bedroom and bathroom downstairs as well! Upstairs features a nice sized loft, 3 additional bedroom & 2 baths, including a huge master bedroom/bath equipped with shower, separate tub, double vanities & massive walk-in closet!   The back yard is a serene sanctuary complete with a sparkling pool and covered patio. Bid now. This beautiful home won't last.

Public Remarks: COMPLETE REMODEL - A 12 year old home totally remodeled to today's tastes and needs. Most popular layout in the sought after Fulton Ranch community of Aegean Cove with 4148 sq ft on a single level with 12' ceilings. Plenty of space to live, entertain and work. Quartz counters throughout, highly durable and luxurious flooring, Spanish and Italian tiling, a five star master bathroom. Totally remodeled 3 other full and one half baths. Custom touches throughout. If you are in the market for a high end property in a desirable location in the East Valley, this is a must see.

This lovely home sits on a large premium 9950SF lot with no neighbors behind and to the side.  Enter through a private gated courtyard and stunning wrought iron double front doors.  As you walk in, not only will you be greeted with an unmistakable pride of ownership, you'll immediately notice the 12' ceilings, large windows, open & bright feel.   Sauntering through the spacious great room, you will be captivated by a gas fireplace with stacked stone to the ceiling.   If that were not enough, the gourmet kitchen will get you in the mood to cook and entertain.  Featuring stunning refinished cabinets with upgraded hardware,

Public Remarks: Gorgeous golf course views! Located just a short walk to the community recreation center Grill 61 & golf course! Step inside and you'll find a spacious open floor plan w/tile flooring throughout the main areas, carpet in bedrooms & a wall of windows taking advantage of the golf course views. Spacious kitchen features SS appliances, updated cabinets w/crown trim, corian  counters, recessed lighting, & a breakfast bar, in addition to a bayed window eating area. Main bedroom with toilet room, dual sinks and his & hers walk in closets. Relax in the covered/extended patio w/a lovely view fence of the golf course keeping you entertained. Springfield is a gated community with 2 pools, spa, golf course, tennis, pickle ball, gym, bar/grill & tons of activities.

Public Remarks: Well-maintained corner lot home with 3 bedrooms and a loft, plus a downstairs den/office. ALL appliances are included (Gas Stove) OWNED solar panels. Large family room and kitchen with pantry and pullout drawers. Laminated wood floors downstairs and 2-inch wood blinds throughout the home. R.O system with connection to the refrigerator. Upstairs laundry room and storage. Interior walls are insulated throughout the home for low noise. The home has two 220 volts in the garage used for electric car charging. Two additional outlets in the upstairs storage room on a dedicated circuit, great for inside extra fridge and/or freezer. Extended covered patio with synthetic grass in back. The front yard is maintained by the HOA. The home is across the street from the community pool and park.

Public Remarks: ONLY TWO DIRECT NEIGHBORS IN THIS BEAUTIFUL RESORT STYLE HOME.  THE PREMIUM LOT SITS NEXT TO A LARGE GREENBELT AND COMMON AREA.  THE INTERIOR INCLUDES 4 SPACIOUS BEDROOMS WITH ONE DOWN STAIRS AND A FULL BATH ON THE LOWER LEVEL.  A GENEROUS ENTRY HALL LEADS TO THE FORMAL LIVING ROOM, FORMAL DINING ROOM AND THE LARGE FAMILY ROOM.  THE KITCHEN INCLUDES UPGRADED LIGHT MAPLE CABINETS, GRANITE COUNTERS AND GAS COOKING.  THE BREAKFAST AREA IS BRIGHT AND OPEN.  THE BACKYARD IS A RESORT LIKE PARADISE.  THE POOL HAS BOTH SOLAR AND GAS HEATING FOR YEAR ROUND USE.  THERE IS AN AMAZING OUTDOOR COOKING AREA AND LOTS OF SPACE FOR THE BIG PARTY AND A GAS FIREPLACE.  THE UPPER FLOOR INCLUDES A NICE SIZED LOFT, 2 ADDITIONAL BEDROOMS AND A LARGE OWNERS SUITE.  THIS IS A GREAT RESORT LIVING HOME.

Public Remarks: Here's the home you have been looking for! This move in ready home was recently remodeled and has been meticulously maintained. This beautiful home is situated on an oversized corner lot and features 4 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms, an open great room floor plan including a flex room/den. No expense was spared transforming this home into a true masterpiece. The chef's kitchen was reconfigured to include a large kitchen island, SS appliances, a gas range, wine fridge, quartzite counter tops, staggered cabinets w/ crown molding, pendant lighting and more. Enjoy dining in your formal dining room or take in the views of the sparkling pool from the eat in kitchen. The master bathroom includes new cabinets, vessel sinks, custom faucets & new lighting. You're going to love the flex room/den adjacent

Public Remarks: This light & bright home sits on over 1/3 acre lot in the highly desirable South Chandler neighborhood of Sun Groves. Formal Living Room & Dining Room can be used in a variety of ways. Dining Room is connected to the kitchen/ Butler's Pantry that offers even more storage than the extensive cupboards & cabinets in the kitchen. Kitchen Island allows for breakfast bar dining or watching tv while doing the dishes. There is also a bedroom located downstairs. The Large Primary Suite has dual sinks/ separate shower/tub combo along w/ a walk in closet. Laundry room is located upstairs for convenience & has additional counter space & cabinets for storage. Out back, you will find a huge covered patio w/ plenty of room for dining & relaxing The pool has a rock waterfall, perfect size for hanging out

Public Remarks: Charming 3 bed, 2 bath residence now for sale! Beautiful faade w/stone accents, large front yard, 2 car garage, and RV gate! Inside you will find spacious dining & living areas w/vaulted ceilings, wood-look floors, outdoor access w/elegant French doors, and neutral palette throughout. The kitchen is comprised of ample cabinetry w/quartz counters, a pantry, SS appliances, an island w/breakfast bar, and breakfast nook w/a lovely bay window. The primary bedroom features private outdoor access, a walk-in closet, and ensuite w/dual sinks. The expansive backyard includes a covered patio, mature citrus tree, and a refreshing pool perfect for the warm summer days! What are you waiting for? Call NOW!

Public Remarks: Welcome to this Beautiful Move-In Ready, Energy Efficient home in the community of Old Stone Ranch with HEATED Groto POOL, SPA and owned SOLAR.  You'll enjoy the privacy of no neighbor on one side and no neighbor directly behind home as home borders greenbelt/common area. This home features a spacious floorplan with an Open Concept Kitchen, Large Island with Granite countertops and Stainless-Steel appliances including Gas Range. All bedrooms and bathrooms on 1st floor (no closet in 4th bedroom).  Large Bonus Room on 2nd floor prewired for surround sound AND wet bar (can be used as a theater room, entertaining space, teen space, the possibilities go on and on.  Unfinished storage space also on 2nd floor with lots of potential options for use.  Low maintenance artificial turf in frontyard

Public Remarks: Want great access to shopping, dining & entertainment? Then welcome to your new nest just around the corner from Chandler Fashion Center. This little enclave is so close to so much! Come home to a bright, light space with vaulted ceilings in all the right places. The wood look tile flooring in the main living areas, cozy yet modern fireplace in the great room & open kitchen/dining space make this the spot where everyone will want to be. Don't miss the adorable powder room under the stairs too! Then retreat to the primary bedroom: it's downstairs so you can walk right out back to enjoy that morning cup of coffee on your covered patio. The wide open yard (with an RV gate) & a community pool just around the corner make this sweet home ready for relaxing inside or out. All it's missing is you!

Public Remarks: BASEMENT HOME! Stunning one of a kind custom home in the gated community of Germann Country Estates on an oversized lot! This is an entertainer's dream home!  Upon entry, you are welcomed to an inviting formal dining/living room with beautiful architectural features and Travertine floors throughout the main living areas. The kitchen boasts natural stone countertops and a stone range hood as well as Stainless Steel Appliances.  The spacious master bedroom has an ensuite bathroom with granite accents, a massive organized walk-in closet , sitting area and walk-out to the pool deck. Enjoy the cool temperatures of the basement that has 3 additional bedrooms, main family area as well a full marble accent bathroom!  The guest house is a blank slate to be finished

Public Remarks: Wow just wow!! Gorgeous move-in-ready home is now on the market! Inside this 4 beds, 2 baths residence is a captivating interior boasting neutral palette, beautiful wood flooring, & a bright living/dining room w/high vaulted ceilings perfect for receiving guests. The well-sized great room w/backyard access & a fireplace to keep you warm during winter is waiting for your personal touches. Immaculate kitchen boasts granite counters, a plethora of white cabinets, SS appliances, a pantry, a peninsula w/a breakfast bar, & a center island. This home also has a bonus room & a den ideal for an office or extra bedroom. A huge basement w/a wet bar is great for an entertainment area.

Public Remarks: Be a proud owner of this beautiful 3 bed, 2 bath home in the popular Springfield Lakes! Nestled on a cul-de-sac offering an excellent curb appeal, a 3-car split garage, and mature desert landscape. Enter to discover a welcoming great room w/pre-wired surround sound system, formal dining room, custom paint, and tile floors w/carpet in all the right places. Fully equipped kitchen boasts luxurious hickory wood cabinets, spacious Brazilian granite counter tops with contrasting travertine backsplash, pantry, and an island w/breakfast bar. Main bedroom has an ensuite with a separate tub/shower, dual vanities, and a walk-in closet. The good-sized backyard with a cozy covered patio is the perfect resting spot after a busy day! Public Remarks: Stunning semi-custom TW Lewis Basement home, situated on private, cul-de-sac, lot in Chandler's San Sebastian at Valencia gated community is now available! This home offers private front courtyard with access to the executive office. Front door opens to soaring ceilings, open floor plan with owner's suite & office split to secondary bedrooms. Chef's kitchen is equipped with KitchenAid stainless steel appliances, R/O system & butlers pantry. 4-pane glass sliding door allows effortless indoor/outdoor living. Backyard boasts an oversized covered patio with Bose built-in speakers, grass landscaping & stone pavers. Head downstairs to the fully finished basement offering 2 bedrooms & media room. 4-car garage perfect for all your cars & toys. Easy access to parks, walking trails, Loop 202 & more!

Public Remarks: Amazing opportunity to own a beautiful home with ALL the upgrades in ALL the right places. This immaculate home offers a highly functional open concept floor plan with designer touches throughout, 10' ceilings, 4 bedrooms, 2.5 baths, a flex room & a 2.5 car garage. The chef's kitchen includes pristine white cabinets, timeless subway backsplash, quartz counter tops, & a large island with ample seating. The Great Room is light & bright & has a large multi-slider that leads out back for that coveted indoor/outdoor ''AZ Living'' lifestyle. The large backyard features a sparkling diving pool, travertine, low maintenance turf & a small basketball court.  And yes, this home could have been designed by Joanna Gaines! Don't miss this one!

Public Remarks: Beautiful 2 bed 1 3/4 bath Carmel in Sunbird Golf Resort. Many upgrades including newer appliances and new roof and front patio. New double pane tinted windows, new vanity in both bathrooms and new countertop in kitchen. No carpet. Beautiful back patio overlooking a community area to enjoy the beautiful Arizona weather. One and a half car garage, tile roof, enclosed entryway and a very inviting front yard sitting area. Community features include a Golf course, 2 swimming pools, Tennis/Pickleball courts, bocce ball courts, shuffleboard and horseshoe pits. Inside the clubhouse you will find a billiard room, a library, many craft and card rooms and a restaurant and bar. There is even a post office! You are going to love the resort style living at Sunbird Golf Resort!

Public Remarks: Welcome home to your 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom Chandler beauty! Warner Ranch is a highly desired neighborhood right off of Ray and Kyrene. Step inside where you will find a neutral color palette, bright inviting light through the open windows, and a vaulted ceiling making this space feel grand. Inside the family room, find a fireplace, tile throughout, and an open flow into your kitchen. The kitchen features stainless appliances, granite countertops, and a large pantry. There is one full bedroom and bathroom on the bottom floor making your home inviting for guests! Upstairs find the primary bedroom, and 2 other bedrooms. Step outside to your HUGE beautiful pool, ready for summer! The private backyard is an entertainers dream :)))  3rd CAR GARAGE CONVERTED TO 5th BEDROOM/ OFFICE or FLEX SPACE!!

Public Remarks: *** HORSE  PROPERTY ***       *** WILLING TO TAKE CONTINGENCY OFFER ***    Beautiful custom one-of-a-kind home in the heart of Chandler on Maricopa County Island. This gorgeous Mediterranean style home was completely remodeled in 2012 and is nestled on a 2.5 acre irrigated horse property lot with no HOA and boasts a whopping 7200sqft. The home offers 5 bedrooms, 5 baths, and a 2000sqft finished basement complete with kitchen and bar. Come and enjoy your very own resort-style spa, private gym, infrared sauna, steam room, and custom indoor cold water plunge pool. The list goes on and on... Chef's kitchen, two gas fireplaces, and one wood burning. Resort-style swimming pool and BBQ area.

Public Remarks: This fully remodeled 4 bedroom, 2 bath is a must see!  New bamboo wood flooring throughout, new tile in bath rooms, fresh coat of paint, new quartz countertops and new appliances in kitchen. Samsung fridge included. AC replaced in 2021. Community park is 3 doors down. Huge 3 car garage. Beautiful backyard landscape and patio. Great location in Chandler, close to the loop 202, Chandler Fashion Center and Gilbert Community College.

Public Remarks: Shows like a model and full of upgrades on lot next to extensive community greenbelt. Front courtyard. Extensive ceramic floor tile throughout. Upgraded cabinets in kitchen. Pendant lights over kitchen island. New dishwasher, range/oven, & microwave. R/O in kitchen. Bronze rubbed fixtures throughout. Granite kitchen countertops. Extended cabinets and countertops in kitchen. Built-in Stonecreek entertainment center in great room. Remodeled master bath shower. Lots of Plantation Shutters. Open floor plan with formal dining room. Surround sound with speakers in LR/Office/front courtyard/and back patio. Stereo components & receiver convey. Oasis backyard with paver patio, sparkling play pool and accent landscape lighting system.  Gas fire pit with seating area. Gas stubout for future BBQ.

Public Remarks: Looking for a new place to call home? This charming 3 bed, 3.5 bath 2-story in Horizon Community is the one! A bright and airy great room welcomes you upon entry w/soothing palette, recessed lighting & trending wood-look laminate flooring. The entertainers kitchen features custom light pendants, two-tone cabinetry w/crown moulding, upgraded gold fixtures, SS appliances, granite counters, a pantry, and an island w/a breakfast bar! Continue upstairs to a cozy loft where you can spend a relaxing evening! Experience sweet dreams in the spacious primary bedroom boasting a chic private bath w/dual sinks and a sizable walk-in closet. Laundry room conveniently located upstairs. Backyard covered patio, artificial turf, custom dog house, and paver seating area!

Public Remarks: SOLERA SEDONA MODEL GOLF AND MOUNTAIN VIEWS.  Best location in this 55+ community.  Pampered by its owners.   A true 3-car garage home on the Lone Tree golf course 5th fairway with north/south exposure.  It is a gem.  Patios in front and back with fruit trees, waterfall, gas fire pit, turf grass, in a blooming garden view fenced setting. Inside the 3 bedroom+den  home:  a remodeled kitchen with 42''  cherry cabinets and matching bookcases/entertainment center in family room, Murphy bed/desk in second bedroom, lots of upgraded Classy Closets, wood and tile floors, newer HVAC systems with smart wifi controls, recirculating hot water, water softener, workshop-like garage with cabinets, epoxy floor, fan and workbench with sink. Security screen doors on 4 doors. Just move in!

Public Remarks: Lovely Home in the coveted Springfield Adult Community. Open, cheery floorplan with vaulted ceilings, Plantation shutters, and lots of light. Feels larger than square footage! Split bedroom plan with spacious Great Room, bright extended kitchen, breakfast bar, and dining area with bay window. Covered patio and open yard area for indoor-outdoor living at its best! Enjoy a wide variety of community activities including golf, tennis, pickleball, community pools/spa, basketball, fitness center, and MUCH MORE! Washer, Dryer, Refrigerator, Water Softener and Master Bd TV included.    Epoxy garage floor. New water heater 2021. New dishwasher 2021. Coated Driveway and patio area.    Your new home awaits you!

Public Remarks: Pride of ownership certainly shows in this 2-story property with stone accents, 3-car garage, and a refined landscape! Impressive interior boasts a welcoming family room with cool palette, handsome wood-look floors, striking light fixtures, and plantation shutters throughout. Have a feast in the formal dining room that is also excellent for receiving guests! Chef's kitchen is equipped with granite counters, a plethora of white cabinets w/crown moulding, see-through cupboards, sparkling SS appliances, stylish tile backsplash, a walk-in pantry, and a center island w/a breakfast bar. The well-sized loft is ideal for a family TV area! Primary bedroom offers soft carpet, luxurious ensuite w/dual sinks, make-up area, garden tub, and a walk-in closet.

Public Remarks: Spacious 5 bed 3.5 ba single family home in Chandler! Formal living/ dining space off entry flows to family room with kiva fireplace. Kitchen offers plenty of cabinet & counter space, wall oven + cooktop, warming drawer, and center island w/ breakfast bar. Game room at the back of the home overlooks the backyard & pool. The home offers large bedrooms including DUAL MASTER SUITES, both exiting to the backyard. Enjoy low energy bills with OWNED SOLAR and 2 LG battery banks. Private backyard offers sparkling pool, outdoor shower, ramada w/ above ground spa, and large grassy yard. The home sits on a HUGE north/ south lot w/ 18' RV gate with alley access & concrete pad for all your toys and NO HOA! Great location w/ easy access to freeways, shopping, and dining. Don't miss this one!

Public Remarks: Must see this beautiful corner home with POOL in a desirable Chandler location! A 2 car garage w/extended driveway, lovely front yard, and a cozy porch greet you. Spacious great room w/plantation shutters and a bright family room w/stone fireplace. Designer paint, wood-look tile floors w/carpet in bedrooms, and tons of natural light make up the pleasing interior. Open-concept kitchen offers SS appliances, granite counters, subway tile backsplash, white staggered cabinets, recessed lighting, and an island w/breakfast bar. Main bedroom has a private bathroom w/tiled step-in shower.  Enjoy the entertainer's backyard boasting an RV gate & parking, a large covered patio, lush lawn, and a refreshing fenced pool! Entire plumbing system is brand new. House also has new exterior paint!

Public Remarks: Split bedroom floor plan with a private location. Home has been meticulously maintained and upgraded! Kitchen features  granite counters, tile back splash, breakfast bar, pantry & is open to the family room.  Laminate wood flooring & tile everywhere except BR's. Spacious main bedroom suite has double sinks, walk in closet and a beautiful Re-bath shower enclosure. Second bedroom is split from the main bedroom, making it perfect for your guests. Enjoy the beautiful Arizona weather from your private covered patio & extended patio area which is covered with cool deck, or meet your neighbors while you enjoy a beverage on your front patio. Being sold furnished! Springfield is a gated community with 2 pools, spa, golf course, tennis, pickle ball, gym, bar/grill & tons of activities.

Public Remarks: New paint and carpet greet you as you walk into this open, bright, light filled home.  From your expansive kitchen, look out over the family room to huge windows that have a full view of the back yard. Kitchen includes Stainless flat top stove, microwave, dishwasher & side by side refrigerator. Cozy wood burning fireplace in the living room to keep you warm on cool evenings. Tile in living areas and carpet in bedrooms. Master bedroom has walk in closet, shower & double sinks! Nice big back yard has plenty of space for enjoying the Arizona lifestyle! Yes - Its in the Kyrene School District! This one will go fast!

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 27 SUN RIVER PARCEL D MCR 056044
Public Remarks: This is truly a special home! This beautiful 5 bedroom 3 full bath home with large 3 car garage is located on a HUGE CORNER PRIVATE LOT in the beautiful subdivision of Sun River, with a beautiful backyard, Pebbletec pool, RV gate & large grassy play area. On the interior you will find a large gas cook top, double ovens, 42 inch cabinets, large office, large upstairs bonus room and surround sound.   Located in the highly acclaimed Chandler School District and walking distance to the Elementary School and multiple neighborhood parks. Too many amenities to list - come see this beautiful home today! Pool table included with sale!

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 29 OCOTILLO LAKES PARCEL H MCR 045430
Public Remarks: Wonderful 4 bedroom family home with an over-sized corner lot on cul-de-sac, located in highly desirable Ocotillo Lakes.  Very spacious and open floor plan with vaulted ceilings and gorgeous 18 inch tile in all the main areas. Kitchen has granite counter tops, updated cabinets and a gas range opening to a large family room. Master bathroom has a double vanity and stone shower. Backyard has low heat synthetic grass and a pebble tec pool with waterfall and covered patio. Double wide RV gate on side of house. New AC in 2017, new water heater in 2022. Close to Intel and freeways.  Professional photos coming soon.
Directions: South on Alma School, West on W Powell Way, right on S Vista Pl.  Home is on the corner of S Vista Pl and W Blue Ridge Ct

Public Remarks: 72 HOUR HOME SALE! Beautiful turnkey Chandler pool home, right around the corner from Downtown! This 2195 sq ft home features 3 beds, a loft area, 2.5 baths and many newer (1-2 yrs) upgrades like vinyl flooring in kitchen, carpet w/ thicker padding, both hvac units, exterior paint, pool filter , pool pump,and water heater. Home also features a water softener, pebble sheen pool w/ waterfall, bbq island with grill and more. Right across the street from a beautiful park for nearby play, or right off the 202 to get elsewhere! Can customize how you like, but this home is CLEAN and move in ready! **If interested, please have your agent reach out to schedule showing**

Public Remarks: Beautifully appointed custom home located in the gated community of ''Ryan Estates''. High end ''Wolf'' appliances w/a 6 burner stove, built-in double oven, refrigerator & newer dishwasher.  Huge island open to the family room with incredible built-in entertainment center. Each bedroom has its' own en-suite and walk-in closet.  The half bath has an exterior door to the patio for pool  & outside party guests. Dramatic high coffered ceilings in the formal dining, living room, family room & eating area. The Casita entrance is off the front gated courtyard. Newer highly upgraded carpet & pad installed in 2019. Surround sound & speakers in all rooms inside & out. Oversized heated pool & spa with wonderful sunken gazebo area w/built-in gas barbecue over looking sparkling pool. Putting green area
Private Rmks - DND2: Misting system on patio and gazebo area is conveyed as is  Formal dining room, kitchen dining room, family room, office furniture, tables, lamps and decorator items in the living room, guest bedroom #1 furniture, exercise equipment in the casita is available for sale outside of escrow.    Please give the home owner a 24 hour notice to show home. Close of escrow to be no sooner than April 15th, 202
Directions: South on Arizona Ave, Right on Macaw DR enter gate to Ryan Estates

Public Remarks: Gorgeous home in Springfield Adult Community! Relax & meet the neighbors on your front patio. Low-maintenance front yard with a 2 car garage w/attached cabinets. Split bedroom floorplan is open with neutral paint, tile flooring, and lots of natural light. Spacious kitchen features quartz counters, stainless appliances, pantry,  built in desk, breakfast bar & bay window. The primary bedroom includes a private bathroom with dual sinks, and his & hers walk-in closets. Send out the barbecue invites because you're going to want to entertain in this back yard. Extended covered patio & mature landscaping. Most furniture available on separate bill of sale. Water feature ''as is'' & may need a new leveler. Gated community with 2 pools, spa, golf course, tennis, pickleball, gym, & more!

Public Remarks: Come see this beautiful 4 bed, 3 bath home! The highly upgraded interior boasts new tile floors, neutral palette, large windows, & a spacious living room. Spotless eat-in kitchen features plenty of new cabinets, a pantry, recessed lighting, wood countertop, upscaled SS appliances that include a dishwasher, range/oven, microwave, & a peninsula that adds to the counter space. Sizable primary bedroom offers a pristine ensuite w/dual sinks, a sit-down shower, & a large walk-in closet. Enjoy hosting fun gatherings with your loved ones in the huge & neat backyard with a covered patio. The A/C unit is 2 years old. Don't miss it! Make it yours now!

Public Remarks: This 3 bedroom 2 bedroom single story in the heart of Chandler is just what you have been looking for! Step inside and be greeted with tall ceilings, tons of natural light, new carpet, fresh paint inside and out, and neutral tones throughout. Cook up your favorite meal in your open concept kitchen with plenty of counter space, tons of storage, and even a breakfast bar! The dining room is big enough to host all your family members, near and far. Invite the neighbors for a BBQ and a friendly game of corn hole in your oversized backyard! After a long day, retreat to your large bedroom oasis and take a nice hot bath in your large soaking tub.  With minutes from downtown Chandler, top notch shopping, restaurants, and nightlife, this home has it all!

Public Remarks: Come home to this gorgeous house in one of Chandler's most desirable neighborhoods.  Recently updated throughout including (not limited to) fresh interior paint, HVACs, kitchen cabinets, carpets, etc. This home is truly move-in ready.  You can feel the love when you walk into this 5 bdrm home featuring a spacious living & dining area, gourmet kitchen overlooking the family room with a view of your pristine backyard and patio complete w/upgraded misting system for your enjoyment.  First floor also includes a guest room and full bath.  Upstairs you'll find a huge loft, 3 additional bedrooms, full bath, grand laundry room w/storage and an owner's retreat w/views that will take your breath away. Soak in your jetted tub or slip into your oversized shower. Watch fireworks from your balcony...

Public Remarks: **72 Hour Home Sale!** One-of-a-kind corner lot pool home! Minutes from Downtown Chandler & the 202! This home has 4 bedrooms (one downstairs & 3 upstairs), 2 living areas (one upstairs/one downstairs)! Many upgrades like maple kitchen cabinets w/ roll outs & soft close, stainless appliances, hardwood floors in upstairs living areas and bedrooms, 2 remodeled bathrooms (one w/ heated flooring), doggy door, and insulated garage door. Newer items include lights, outlets & switches, patio slider, ceiling fans, blinds, interior doors, ext & int paint, pebbletech, kool decking, patio roof & hvac ducting to even out temperatures better. Backyard features covered patio area, firepit, lime and lemon trees, sparkling pebbletech pool with waterfall and color changing led light, and new storage shed!

Public Remarks: ''Fulton Ranch'' Desirable Premiere Community in Chandler! This 3 bed, bonus room, den,  2.5 bath home sits on a CUL-DE-SAC lot. It boats a stunning facade w/stone accents, manicured landscape w/lush grass areas, private gated courtyard, RV GATE and 2 car garage w/built-in cabinets and a service door. Inside you will find 12 FEET SOARING CEILING, HARDWOOD FLOOR, formal dining & living rooms, family room , FRENCH DOOR to patio, FIREPLACE w/built-in shelves, and neutral palette throughout. The elegant kitchen offers staggered cabinetry w/crown moulding, pantry, granite counters, mosaic backsplash, SS appliances, pendant lighting, and a huge island. BONUS ROOM for entertaining family and friends. Oversized MASTER SUITE looks over the stunning private pool and has a private access to backyard

Public Remarks: This home shows like a Model! Located in the Beautiful   T W Lewis gated Community of Valencia.  It has wonderful curb appeal, with an awesome courtyard and cozy fireplace.  This home has the popular great room floorplan. Lots of upgrades, with 12 ft ceilings!  The gourmet kitchen includes stainless appliances, and a quartz slab on an over-sized island. A spacious breakfast nook that overlooks the courtyard. The two guest bedrooms, have their own bathrooms. The stunning master bedroom has separate sinks, separate walk- in closets, and a snail shower. The amazing backyard is fantastic. The lot is 16,881 square feet. It features, travertine back patio and with built in bbq and island. Artificial grass/travertine steps around a magnificent pool. Don't miss this home!!!

Public Remarks: This fantastic updated Ranch Style home with great curb appeal is located in Chandler and is ready to move into. Spacious open floor plan, lots of natural light, beautiful wood plank tile floor. Patio Access from Great Room, Primary Bedroom and Kitchen. Walk into the Foyer with direct access to a large living room, includes an office nook. Stunning  kitchen, features granite counters, SS appliances and Shaker Cabinets and then opens up to a large Dining Area with access to the Laundry room and  2 Car Garage. Generous size four bedrooms, ample closets, window blinds and two upgraded tile showers and bathrooms. Large backyard has covered patio. The home is close to Major Freeways, Sky Harbor, ASU, Shopping, Restaurants and Hiking.  Communty has no HOA.

Public Remarks: Looking to live in the gated, resort style Montefino Village community? This 4 bedroom 2.5 bath home offers a great room floor plan, Office and separate Bonus/Exercise room downstairs, oversized loft and large master bedroom with sitting area upstairs. Don't miss the view onto the community park and water. Wood floors and tile in all the right places, kitchen with stainless steel appliances and kitchen island. Upstairs HVAC unit was replaced in 2020. Enjoy a nice walk through the community park, relax by the community pool, or get your workout done at the fitness center. Endless possibilities in this great community! Walking distance to the nearby Ocotillo Golf Club. Situated on a corner lot with neighbors only to one side.

Public Remarks: Incredible opportunity - investors and builders take note! This 2.557 acre, unincorporated county island property has huge potential. The RU-43 zoned, irrigated lot can be subdivided! The property features a 1,998 sq ft, single level, 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath home that includes a spacious kitchen w/bar, separate dining room, large family room with vaulted ceilings, spacious master suite w/private patio, two additional bedrooms, Arizona room, and a large laundry/craft room. This fenced property includes a four-car carport and a separate covered parking area that is large enough for an RV, several vehicles, trailers, tractors, or all of your toys. This property is located in a quiet area of Chandler near dining, shopping, entertainment, freeways, airports, and some of the valley's best schools.

Public Remarks: Introducing this beautiful cul-de-sac street home in Chandler where fantastic and lavish interior abound! 4 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, a 2 car garage, large den w/private exit, & a well-manicured landscape + a nice front courtyard, you'll love it! There's also a formal dining room, & spacious fireplace living room, coffered ceilings, plantation shutters, ez wood-tile flooring t/out, in a split floor plan. Cooking is spectacular in this open kitchen complete w/rich staggered cabinetry, subway tile backslash, SS appliances including a gas cook top, double wall ovens, & island w/breakfast bar.  Main bedroom boasts a snail glass block shower, dual sinks, & walk-in closet. Long covered back patio just great for relaxing. Thoughtfully laid out with a N/S exposure. Make this gem yours! Call today!

Public Remarks: You will love living in this active adult community!  Sunbird Golf Resort offer  an 18 Hole Executive golf course, 43000 sf Clubhouse/rec center with fitness center, Billiards tables, two swimming pools, four Tennis courts, 6 shuffle board courts, Horseshoe pits, Bocce Ball courts  all within a secure guard gated neighborhood.  This home has 2 bedrooms and 2 baths  with a split floorplan. There is a great room with access to the covered patio. The Kitchen features slab granite counters, Stainless appliances and reverse osmosis.  The home has tile everywhere except where the bedrooms are carpeted. There are shutters, Sunscreens, Garage Cabinets and a water softener. Existing furniture available upon request.

Public Remarks: The home is in Chandler, one of the Valley's fastest growth areas. It is closely located to shopping & restaurants, and minutes away from highly sought after charter schools such as Great Hearts and Athos. The community, Belmont Estates, is still rather new, yet  completely built out and mature. The home is walking distance to Centennial Park, convenient for an  early morning jog or after-dinner stroll, as well as family and community fun-packed activities.    The open floor plan and interior design are contemporary, yet neutral, with formal living room, dining room, den, and a teens room (with a built-in closet that can quickly converted into another room) as normally found in high-end luxury homes, common in Belmont Estates.

Public Remarks: Here's a beautifully maintained and nicely updated home in Clemente Ranch. Upgraded in all the right areas, including a recent HVAC system replacement. There's an open, remodeled kitchen with gorgeous quartz counters, marble backsplash, single-basin/quartz sink and SS appliances. You'll love the soaring ceilings, beautiful wood-like flooring, a full BR/BA downstairs and 3 BRs with two full BAs upstairs. The yards are well manicured and beautifully landscaped. The pool and a large covered patio are next to the newer turf play/pet area. The pride of ownership is something you will notice from the moment you see this gorgeous home. The location provides easy freeway access, top-rated schools, tons of restaurants, shops, parks.

Public Remarks: Welcome Home to Mission Drive! This NO HOA home is ready for its next family. With one of the larger lots in the community, this charming home has many great features. Tasteful landscaping surrounds the property with just enough green space to enjoy but not be inundated with major upkeep. Head inside and step into a Saltillo tiled foyer leading in the an amply sized split family room with a wood burning chimenea like fireplace. Next over we have a formal dining room and eat in kitchen space with built for extra storage. The kitchen was completely remodeled in 2017 to include all appliances, cabinets and countertops. There is a plethora of storage in the space! This space also boasts a breakfast bar that has double sided cabinets.

Public Remarks: WOW! A single level home, split floor plan, with a 3 car garage and a pool in Chandler!?! It's here! Move right in to this freshly painted (2022) home in the cul-de-sac, with lots of great upgrades, and NO carpet! New HVAC unit in 2017, all new roof underlayment in 2018, and 2019 new OWNED solar panels make this well loved home an excellent place to call home. Spacious floor plan with four bedrooms and a den offer plenty of room for live/work/play. Backyard with beautiful fenced in pool (resurfaced in 2016) and lots of open space offer plenty of opportunity to make it your own. Be sure to schedule a showing with your agent before this one is gone!

Public Remarks: Light, bright & spacious 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms home with a pool, spa & 3 car garage is nestled in a convenient Chandler location on a north/south exposure lot & across from park. The updated kitchen has Corian countertops, tiled backsplash, walk-in pantry, breakfast area, gas stove, salad sink in island & overlooks the family room with fireplace. The large primary bedroom has vaulted ceilings, huge walk-in closet, on suite bathroom with dual vanities & separate shower & tub. One bedroom & bathroom is on first level. Great interior features include central vac, ceiling fans & 18 inch tile throughout. Great for entertaining, the backyard has lush landscaping, orange, lemon & key lime trees, heated pool & spa, pool water feature, wood fire pizza oven & stubbed for natural gas for grill.

Public Remarks: Beautiful custom home in the private, gated community of Country Lane Estates conveniently located in Chandler near parks, golf courses, shopping, restaurants/entertainment and freeway access. This meticulously kept 5-bedroom home features gorgeous curb appeal and stunning entry through the double iron front door. Inside you'll fall in love with the expansive great room, 12' ceilings, formal dining room and den. The gourmet kitchen boasts granite counters, extra large island and eat-in area, 48'' stainless refrigerator, gas cook-top stove and ornate range hood, as well as large walk-in pantry. Enjoy your view out back to the sparkling pool and extended covered patio, perfect for entertaining while cooking in the built-in grill or watching the game outside. The split floor plan...
Directions: South on McQueen, West on Prescott Place through entry gate of Country Lane Estates.

Public Remarks: What an opportunity! Gorgeous property nestled on an oversized corner cul-de-sac in Springfield Adult Community! This beauty offers low-maintenance front yard with a 2 car garage w/attached cabinets, and a cozy patio ideal for your morning coffee. Interior boasts a perfectly flowing open floor with neutral paint, tile flooring, and lots of natural light. Fantastic kitchen features matching appliances, ample cabinets, granite counters, pantry, and an island w/breakfast bar. The primary bedroom includes a private bathroom with dual sinks, & a walk-in closet. The backyard is comprised of a covered patio, extended seating area, and desert landscaping. Gated community with 2 pools, spa, golf course, tennis, pickleball, gym, & more!

Public Remarks: Gorgeous 5 bedroom 4 bath home with a 3 car garage in the highly desirable Fulton Ranch Community.  Higher ceilings & a beautiful foyer makes for a grand entrance.  Bright & open Kitchen with upgraded granite counters, gas cooktop, center island & a walk in pantry.  Neutral paint & large tile flooring with a separate formal dining area, a family & a living room.  Bedroom  located downstairs with a full bathroom.  Upstairs are 4 large bedrooms with plenty of storage & 3 bathrooms.  The large master suite offers 2 sinks, a large walk-in closet & a separate shower & tub.  Outside you have an upstairs balcony & downstairs you have a spill over hot tub to a serene private pool with a large yard. Walking paths, lakes, shopping, dining, amazing schools are all within walking distance!

Public Remarks: Welcome to this stunning single level home with 3 car garage, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, den, living/dining rooms, updated laundry room and beautiful kitchen that opens up to the family room.  Granite counter-tops in kitchen with stunning cabinets and gorgeous tile flooring throughout. The master bedroom with 2 closets is split from the 3 other bedrooms giving you the ultimate in privacy. Backyard is generous in size with lush landscaping making it perfect for entertaining or for your own enjoyment of peace and tranquility. The Exterior Paint, Ac, Windows, Doors and newer Roof, along with the Interior of this home have been redone in recent years and the home is absolutely Gorgeous! This home has been lovingly cared for and it shows!

Public Remarks: Welcome to your new home! This fabulous 3 bed, 2 bath residence w/an RV gate is waiting for its new owner! Spacious open floor plan, warm palette, ceiling fans, entertainment niche, wood-look tile floors, & plant shelves. The eat-in kitchen boasts plenty of wood cabinets,  pantry, built-in appliances, stylish counters, & an island w/a breakfast bar. The primary bedroom boasts plush carpet, bay window, private ensuite w/dual sinks, & a large closet. Enjoy hosting fun gatherings in the backyard w/a covered patio, extensive pavers, attached pergola, lush green landscape, & brilliant blue skies all around! Have fresh fruit and veggies from your own organic garden.  Enjoy your evenings around the outdoor fire ring.  Relax & enjoy the all seasons heated community pool.  HOA includes Basic cable.

Public Remarks: This one owner, 4 bed, 2 bath home is waiting for the perfect person to spruce it up and call it home. The interior is original with oak cabinets and formica countertops, but the roof, a/c, and water heater have all been replaced and regularly maintained since 2013. Inside you'll find a large great room, open concept living area, spacious bedrooms, vaulted ceilings throughout, a large primary bedroom and en suite with soaking tub and walk in closet. The kitchen includes a newer gas range, walk in pantry, lots of cabinets and a big island for gathering. Relax in the pool or enjoy a cool beverage on the covered patio! Close to the freeway, shopping, eateries, entertainment, award winning schools, Desert Breeze Park, Intel and Honeywell.

Public Remarks: This ultimate rare, customized basement home is nothing short of amazing. Enter through the decorative steel gate into a large, beautiful courtyard. The courtyard is a great entertainment area & is connected to a gorgeous side yard with synthetic grass that makes for a great play area.  As you walk through the front door you will notice the 10' ceilings and all the custom touches in this home. The flooring alone would cost nearly $40,000 today. The chef's kitchen is a total redesign and is amazing and has a custom walk-out to the courtyard area.  On the main floor you will find the primary bedroom with a totally remodeled ensuite bathroom. Also on the main floor you'll find  2 secondary bedrooms, 1.5 bathrooms and a large office.

Public Remarks: Look no further! This charming single-story residence in the Adult Community of Solera is the one! This 2 bed, 2 bath home offers a 2-car garage and manicured landscape. Enter to discover the desirable open layout with neutral palette, vaulted ceilings, tile flooring, and abundant natural light. The fully equipped kitchen features ample wood cabinets, a pantry, a peninsula w/a breakfast bar, track lighting, and plenty of counter space. Bay window on the dining allows abundant natural light. End your busy day in the primary bedroom with soft carpet, a closet, and a pristine bathroom w/dual sinks & a walk-in closet. The perfectly-sized backyard has a covered patio & a low-care landscape perfect for relaxing & enjoying exquisite views of endless blue sky.

Public Remarks: Horizon Model located on the Golf Course with a View  of Lone Tree's #17 Fairway. 2 bedrooms, 2 baths, Split floor plan! Plus Den. This home Light and Bright! ! The kitchen is equipped with ample cabinetry, a pantry, lovely breakfast bar, all appliances are included. Large master bedroom with private bath, his & her sinks, as well as 2 spacious walk-in closets. Private Guest Suite and Guest Bath. The perfectly-sized backyard has a covered patio & a low-care landscape perfect for relaxing & enjoying exquisite AZ Sunset views and endless blue sky. 2 car extended garage with lot's of storage! It's a Solera Beauty located in a fantastic active adult community with amenities galore! Golf, 2 heated pools & spa, tennis & pickle ball courts, bocce ball, workout facility & lots of clubs to join!

Public Remarks: The search is over! This 5 bed, 3 bath beauty checks all the boxes. Starting from the 3 car split garage, RV gate, manicured landscape, and stone faade. You will enter inside to discover an open den/game room, access to your courtyard, al large formal dining room w/ pass-thru to the kitchen. Cooking in this kitchen is spectacular complete w/SS appliances, beautiful granite counters, island meal prep, tons of storage, and a casual nook. Other features include high end lighting fixtures, tile flooring, neutral tones, & stone wall accents. Upstairs loft is excellent for a 2nd living area. Public Remarks: Stunning home showcasing a backyard where dreams come true...This is the one you've been looking for! Designer palette, trending wood-look floors, plantation shutters, arched doorways & so much more! The amazing backyard is an entertainer's dream w/large patio, sparkling pool w/Baja step & waterfall, built-in BBQ bar, & so much more.  Make this beautiful home yours.

Public Remarks: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION!!! Large 5 bedroom home w/1 bedroom & bath w/a walk-in shower on the first floor. Big Kitchen, great for entertaining! The Kitchen overlooks the family room & the beautiful backyard w/a custom heated pool, spa & a sunken BBQ pit that puts you in a perfect position to interact with those sitting at the swim-up bar. The pool & spa are great for family fun & pure relaxation. The backyard looks out to the beautiful Sundance Park with its large playground. Keep an eye on the kids from the kitchen or backyard. Big bedrooms upstairs w/built-in shelving & lofts for sleeping or fun hide-a-ways. The Master bedroom overlooks the backyard w/two walk-in closets, his & her sink & vanities and a separate garden tub & shower. Looking for a BIG home to raise your family in?

Public Remarks: Split bedroom, 2 bed, 2 bath home in Springfield Adult Community! Meet your neighbors on your front patio, ideal for your morning coffee. Interior boasts a perfectly flowing open floor with neutral paint, tile flooring t/out the main areas, vaulted ceilings, ceiling fans, and plantation shutters. The kitchen features stainless appliances, granite counters, pantry, and a breakfast bar opening out to a bayed window eating area. The primary bedroom includes a private bathroom w/dual sinks, step-in shower, & a walk-in closet. Private fenced yard perfect for your pets. You'll also find a sunroom!  Brand new Trane AC! Springfield is a gated community with 2 pools, spa, golf course, tennis, pickle ball, gym, bar/grill & tons of activities.

The open kitchen allows you to stay in the conversation while preparing your favorite snacks or meals for your friends and family.  Adjoining Great room is open  and bright.  Kitchen has breakfast bar and eat in area. Great cabinet and counter space. Step out into the back yard and enjoy the extra space that allows you to play catch with the kids,

Public Remarks: Gorgeous newly renovated 3 bedroom 2.5 bath in Chandler Village Subdivision. This lovely home is loaded with upgrades, brand new carpet, 2-tone paint, luxurious light fixtures, & wood plank vinyl in all of the right places. Formal area at entry is nice and spacious with vaulted ceilings. Family room is large, bright and open and is right off of the kitchen area with back door slider access to an enormous private backyard with private pool. Kitchen boast of brand new granite counter-tops, stainless steel appliances, beautiful cabinets, & a huge walk-in pantry. Master bedroom is generous in size with a large walk-in closet. Double sinks, separate garden tub & shower at master bath. Don't miss this one!

Public Remarks: Location! Location! Location! You will be impressed from the moment you drive up to this gorgeous, single-story custom home less than 15 minutes to Chandler Fashion Center, Sky Harbor International Airport, and Old Town Scottsdale! This home sits on an oversized cul-de-sac lot in the beautiful, gated community of Cayley Manor. The bright open floor plan boasts beautiful wood-look plank tile flooring, 12' coffered ceilings, a gourmet kitchen including a magnificent spindle-leg center island, custom cabinetry, granite countertops, high-end GE Monogram appliances, farmhouse sink, breakfast bar, large informal dining area, and generous walk-in pantry. The large living room features a gas fireplace and nesting sliding glass doors that open to the backyard allowing for indoor/outdoor enjoyment.

Public Remarks: Gorgeous home located in an intimate upscale gated community in Chandler. This stunning home features three bedrooms (split master) a den, two-and-a-half baths, oversized three car garage & gorgeous backyard. Kitchen features stacked shaker upgraded soft close cabinets, quartz countertops, arabesque marble backsplash, pull out receptacle trash bins, huge built in fridge, monogram professional stove, undermount lighting and electric outlets. Inside, you will discover an open layout, abundant natural light, a charming living room, and a fantastic eat-in kitchen., with a center island  & breakfast bar, Huge pantry & laundry room. Bonus of newer A/C units as well as brand new carpet and refinished pool.  Beautifully upkept family home.  Don't miss this one.

Public Remarks: DO NOT MISS seeing this very RARE, single owned, over-sized lot home. This lovely stone trimmed home is over 3300 sq feet and features 4 bedrooms 2.5 bathrooms with a MASSIVE loft that could be converted into 5th bedroom. Step inside to several BEAUTIFUL upgrades including a two-story stone fireplace, soaring ceilings, fresh paint, wood grain tile, freshly painted kitchen cabinets, new tile back splash and upgraded light fixtures throughout. The backyard is an entertainers dream with a custom Jordan brand sport court, large and newly resurfaced diving pool, custom built-in gas BBQ, new turf and an extended patio. This home as been METICULOUSLY cared for and is in pristine condition. COME CHECK THIS BEAUTY OUT!!

Public Remarks: Welcome to this gorgeous neighborhood! Terrific 4 bedroom and 2.5 bath home with a 3 car garage. The kitchen boasts generous counter space and a breakfast bar, making cooking and entertaining a delight. Picture evenings by the fireplace and mornings having coffee out on the covered patio in the backyard. The main bedroom boasts a private ensuite with dual sinks and walk-in closet. Other bedrooms offer plush carpet, ceiling fans, and sizable closets. Relax with your favorite drink in the fenced in backyard with a patio, lush grass, an in-ground pool, and great potential for adding personal touches. Don't wait! Make this beautiful home yours today.

Public Remarks: Welcome home to this amazing 3 bedroom 2.5 bath home plus den in terrific Campo Verde. Loads of upgrades including granite counters, double ovens, kitchen island, engineered wood floors in espresso, stainless appliances, fireplace, tiled backsplash and lots of cabinet and counter space. The master bath is to die for with his/her sinks, garden tub, walk in shower and incredibly upgraded master closet. There are 2 side bedrooms plus a den.  Also includes a family room, formal dining room and living room.  Great laundry room too.  The exterior features a swimming pool with spa, covered patio for the bbq and a 3 car tandem garage with epoxy floors.  It's a great floorplan and beautiful home.  Buyer to verify all info.
Directions: North to Elgin, east to Emerson and south to home.

Public Remarks: Move-in ready home with no HOA!! And a HUGE backyard!! In a great location in Chandler, minutes from Downtown. This delightful single-level home features new interior/exterior paint, wood flooring in bedrooms, new vinyl flooring in the kitchen, new granite kitchen countertops, new backsplash, and refinished cabinets. New bathrooms, ceiling fans, doors, new windows, vanities, washer and dryer included, gate door, and almost brand new roof done in 2021. The home includes a bonus room with an entrance from the backyard. Huge backyard with RV gate and plenty of space to accommodate vehicles, trailers, toys, and more. Public Remarks: This eye-catching new home greets guests with a concrete paver driveway and walkway and a charming covered porch. Inside, you'll find a spacious great room, a gourmet kitchen featuring 42'' upper cabinets, quartz countertops, a double oven, a center island, a walk-in pantry and an adjacent morning room with two large windows. Other main-floor highlights include a mudroom and a convenient bedroom and bathroom. Upstairs, you'll find a laundry, a central loft, three generous bedrooms and two baths with cultured marble countertops. A lavish owner's suite showcasing an oversized walk-in closet and deluxe bath with walk-in shower rounds out the floor.

Public Remarks: Wonderful home with easy access to 101 Freeway, shopping, schools and more. Home interior features tile and wood laminate flooring throughout. Living areas are located on main floor with three bedrooms + loft upstairs. Cozy fireplace in family room. Master bedroom has double door entrance, walk-in closet & dual sinks with separate tub and shower in master bath. Backyard is low maintenance with partial view fencing toward greenbelt. Two car garage. Walking paths throughout neighborhood. Thank you for visiting and Welcome Home!

Public Remarks: 3-4 BR, 2 BA GEM in coveted Sun Groves! Great Pool and deck with a key-lime tree! Pebble Tech pool with covered patio, and gated turf play area. updated hot water heater, new in 2020 soft water system, new in 2019 Samsung Fridge, newer pool pump. Soaking Tub & Walk-In Closet in Master.Attic insulation added 2017. Laminate and tile floors throughout, vaulted ceiling & ceiling fans. OPEN Kitchen Granite counters & hickory cabinets, center island, lots of cabinets, and pantry! Inside laundry room. 4th BR/Den is an Open Concept office now but add back the doors & back to 4 BR's if needed. Location on a quiet street just 1/2 block from the park/pond. No homes facing across the street. Large 2 car garage with epoxy floor. GREAT CHANDLER SCHOOLS! This is the one you've been waiting for!  HURRY!!

Public Remarks: Fantastic home nestled on a peaceful cul-de-sac is now on the market! This single-story property features a 2-car garage & desert landscape. Inside, you'll find a welcoming interior with a large living/dining room, soothing palette, vaulted ceiling, laminate flooring, & plush carpet in all right places. Cozy family room enjoys a corner fireplace perfect for the winter. The kitchen includes ample oak cabinets, SS appliances, & a breakfast bar. The sizable main bedroom comes w/a private bathroom & a closet. Huge Arizona room w/tile flooring is great for entertaining. Outstanding backyard is a complete Oasis made for entertaining year round with its refreshing pool, relaxing spa, & warm fireplace. Don't miss this opportunity. Call today!

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 89 RIALTO HILLS LOT 3-94 TR B MCR 034146
Public Remarks: Very warm 3 bedroom, 2 bath home you must see to appreciate! Great room floor plan with vaulted ceilings and upgraded staggered tile flooring.  Kitchen has dark cabinetry, granite countertops, glass tile backsplash, stainless steel appliances and a dining area off of the kitchen. Master bedroom has a bay window and walk in closet. Master and guest bathrooms both have tub and shower combos.  Utility area off of the kitchen. South facing covered patio.  Back yard has a pebble-tec play pool with a waterfall, synthetic grass area and low maintenance desert landscaping. New AC unit in July 2021. Low quarterly HOA fees. Close to Chandler Mall, Chandler Regional hospital, restaurants, shopping  and the 202 freeway. Sellers require a 60-90 day leaseback to find a new home.
Directions: South on Alma School. West on Mercury Way. South on Apache Dr. West on Boston to the home on the south side of the street.

Public Remarks: Wonderful Updated NEWPORT MODEL on the golf course.  Newer AC, new laminate throughout with carpet in bedrooms, new kitchen and a great patio overlooking the ninth fairway. Fully furnished and ready to move into. As a winter retreat or full-time residence, this bright & airy home is move-in ready. Great quiet location in this wonderful, friendly adult community where you can enjoy all of the amenities including golf, tennis, swimming, pickle-ball, billiards, restaurant, lounge, state-of-the-art fitness center and so much more. Must see to appreciate why this home would be the best way to enjoy the SunBird Golf Resort lifestyle.

Public Remarks: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! Welcome home with this charming 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom, single story in the heart of Chandler. A peaceful retreat awaits outback with mature desert landscaping that is meticulously maintained. An extended pavered patio offers plenty of space for Arizona living and entertaining. The inviting living room overlooks the covered patio, it is well lit with natural light and vaulted ceilings. This open area is perfect for entertaining with the addition of the dining nook. Neutral and warm tones throughout the home are complemented with updated bathrooms, tile, paint and fixtures. The spacious, bright primary suite offers a walk in closet, walk in shower and an oversized vanity. Conveniently located near the Loop 101 and 202 it is just minutes away from the Chandler

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 32 LAYTON LAKES PHASE 2B AND PARCEL 21 MCR 119330
Public Remarks: This incredibly upgraded NEXT Generation home ON OVER 1/3 of an ACRE is nestled in the beautiful community of Layton Lakes. The main home boasts a gorgeous kitchen with a 6-burner gas range, warming hood & beverage refrigerator.  Perfect split bedroom floorplan with incredibly upgraded bathrooms. Carpet only in secondary and Next Gen bedrooms. Master has 2 walk-in closets.  The Next Gen suite is perfect for those long-term guests or relatives. Complete kitchen, living area and full bedroom and upgraded bath with walk-in closet and stack laundry, and of course its own private entrance and garage.   The enormous yard will give you the opportunity to create something truly special!

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 46 CALLOWAY AT THE VINEYARDS MCR 041340
Public Remarks: Don't miss out on this well cared for home. Situated in the heart of the desirable Vineyards neighborhood which is close to freeway access and all shopping. This home shows pride of ownership throughout. The original owner was a master woodworker and has trimmed the home in tasteful oak. The kitchen has custom cabinets lined with pull out drawers and a fantastic kitchen island. The great room has a fireplace and 12' ceilings making this one really feel open and airy. Out back you will find a covered patio and low maintenance landscaping  plus a grapefruit and a lemon tree.  There is even an herb garden.  The garage is oversized and will accommodate a full sized truck. This one has north-south exposure and enjoys an extra wide lot with a RV Gate. Hurry this one will not last!

Public Remarks: Come fall in love with this gorgeous & spacious home on an oversized corner lot in a private gated south Chandler community! Near the 101 & 202, this beauty beckons those searching for the conveniences of the city while offering respite from the hustle & bustle. This two-story 6 bedroom, 3.5 bath offers a 3-car side-by-side garage, an 8' double-gate, dramatic vaulted ceilings, downstairs primary bedroom with a huge walk-in closet, office/den with double-doors, separate dining room with butler's pantry, & a separate formal living/flex room. A spacious kitchen with additional builder-upgrades opens to the family room and dining nook, providing ample room for gathering in the heart of the home.

Public Remarks: Beautiful TW Lewis home with a private CASITA in the highly acclaimed gated community of San Sebastian at Valencia! Enter through a private, gated courtyard with outdoor fireplace & fountain. New interior paint throughout! Formal dining room offers coffered ceilings as well as the office that includes built-in shelving. The kitchen offers Kitchenaid stainless steel appliances, updated, refinished cabinets, granite counters, large granite island, wall ovens & walk-in pantry! Great room layout & large grassy backyard with oversized pool,  perfect for your largest gatherings! The master suite is privately located, features soaking tub, walk-in shower & 2 large walk-in closets. This community offers lakes, playgrounds, walking paths & Carlson Elementary (also a CTA) within walking distance.

Home features include 4 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms, a large master on suite retreat, a cozy courtyard outfitted with a fireplace, a pool and so much more.  The location offers close proximity to freeway access and minutes from both downtown Chandler and downtown Gilbert and San Tan Mall.  Shopping, dining and parks surround the community.  This is a must see!

Public Remarks: Lovely and popular Sedona Model on the golf course.   Open and bright floor plan with large windows in living room and dining room that look out to the golf course.  Up-dated wood like Laminate floors in  dining, kitchen.  Large Bright Master bedroom with windows that look out to the golf course.  Master has walk-in closet and  in the bathroom there is a separate private toilet and shower room.  A/C  New in 2014.   Golf Cart garage with separate garage door for easy access. Public Remarks: Gorgeous & priced to sell!!!  This home has 4 bedrooms+den, 2 full baths & a pool.  The interior was mostly remodeled 4 years ago w/all new custom cabinets (soft pull doors/drawers) t/o the home, matching granite counter tops t/o & wood plank tile flooring.  There are also plantation shutters in the entire home! A/C was replaced 2 years ago. The kitchen is open & bright with plenty of cabinets/countertop space, a large bar & gorgeous pendant lighting.  The bathrooms have the same beautiful cabinets, granite countertops & flooring.  The back yard has a covered patio, synthetic grass, a play pool w/waterfall & one of the most unique & beautiful retaining walls you'll find!  Located close to parks, schools, freeways, shopping, restaurants, golf course & Intel!  This home is a must see!

Only single level homes around the home, so no 2 stories looking into your backyard! You will love living in this great location -which is also close to Desert Breeze Park!

Public Remarks: Desirable South Chandler Home in Cooper Commons! This 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home features a sparkling Private Pool, nice Corner Lot, and popular North/South exposure. Inside, the floorplan offers a nice open living room with a spacious kitchen and dining area. The kitchen features a breakfast/serving area with granite countertops, tile backsplash and stainless steel appliances. The Master Bedroom is split from the other bedrooms and boasts a large walk-in closet with dual sinks and separate shower & tub. The large front yard offers grass with nice plants and shrub border. The backyard has a nice covered patio with extended pavers with plants and rock. The 2 car garage also has added storage cabinets and work area.

Public Remarks: This gorgeous, remodeled home in Circle G is everything you've been looking for! 5 bedrooms, 3.5 baths on nearly an acre lot (.88) with a 4 car garage with gated driveway plus RV garage with separate studio space addition (could be guest quarters). Stunning kitchen features spacious island, quartz countertops, high end appliances including Subzero refrigerator and Bertazzoni gas range. Designer features include a custom modern barn door to laundry room, metal/glass grid wall in kitchen, antique pantry door, gorgeous lighting and many more custom details throughout. Lush backyard is perfect for entertaining and features gorgeous pool and spa, firepit and spacious covered patios. This home is a dream!

Boasting a great room open concept with 2,220 square feet, 10 ft ceilings, huge kitchen w/ large eat up island, quartz countertops, private courtyard, and frontyard landscaping all included. Sand stucco, large rooms, spray foam insulation, generous LED lighting, coach lights, pavered two car driveway and full two car garage with 8' insulated garage doors and a wifi enabled door opener. The neighborhood includes a community pool. **Photos are of the builder's furnished model**

Public Remarks: Exceptionally clean and bright 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home in one of the most desirable neighborhoods in Chandlers of Ray Ranch Estates. Close to freeway access, nearby shops and restaurants, and Tempe Sports Complex. You'll fall in love with the large windows with shutters and high ceilings, which makes the space light and bright! You'll also fall in love with the open floor plan concept with a large island opening up to the living room. Features of the living room includes a gas fireplace. This master en-suite comes with a full master bathroom, with separate tub and shower, dual vanities, and walk-in closet! This home features a large backyard with covered patio, extended grass area, and a children's playground for the kids!

Public Remarks: Absolutely amazing single story home with a fantastic location in The Woods at Tiburon subdivision in Chandler.  This home has it all including a huge 1/4 acre lot with a private backyard entertaining area featuring no rear neighbors, a Pebble-tec pool, extended covered patio, Tuff Shed for extra storage and mature fruit trees.  Upon entering this home, you'll find a spacious great room with loads of natural sunlight, vaulted ceilings, 3 bedrooms plus an office (could be a 4th bedroom) and 2.5 baths.  Gourmet modern kitchen features custom soft closing cabinets from Stonecreek with pull out shelves, pantry, stainless steel appliances, convection oven, and under cabinet lighting.  Lovely dining area with a bay window and custom cabinetry overlooking the stunning backyard.  Master

Public Remarks: Spacious floorplan on a large lot in one of Chandler's charming gated communities, Grande Reserve, where residents' pride of ownership is apparent. Premium location near shopping, restaurants, L-101, L-202, and I-10. Natural light abounds as this home is fresh, current, and move-in ready, featuring beautiful hardwood and 18'' travertine floors, 4'' baseboards, neutral paint, white plantation shutters, and three gas fireplaces! Gorgeous chef's kitchen with large center island and gas stovetop, granite countertops, professional stainless steel Viking appliances, and under-cabinet lighting. The kitchen opens to a generous family room with a cozy shiplap fireplace and an updated wet bar. Guest suite conveniently located downstairs with remodeled bathroom.

Public Remarks: Simply adorable 4 bedroom 2 bath 1704 sf home with sparkling pool on a corner lot with NO HOA! Beautiful grassy lawn in the front and backyards. Master Bath was remodeled in pretty white and gray color scheme with standup shower.   Master Bedroom features large walk in closet and separate exit onto patio and pool area. The other 3 bedrooms are spacious and are served by the generous hall bath featuring tub/shower and linen storage.  Two separate living areas flow nicely together with dining room (which could be used as an office space or a kids play area) and lovely kitchen.  Granite counters, Staggered cabinets, stainless appliances, breakfast bar and large pantry make this kitchen a dream
Directions: South on Central to Mesquite. Quick right on Mesquite to Central. South on Central to home on right side.

Public Remarks: Situated in the popular Cooper Commons Community, this charming Santa Barbara style two story home includes three bedrooms and 2.5 baths. Vaulted ceilings, beautiful architectural detailing and a myriad of windows allows this home to feel light and bright with views to the second story ceiling  from the large great room area.  Brand new neutral flooring in all the main living areas, hallways and bedrooms, fresh  interior and exterior paint, stainless appliances, master bath shower door and vanity light plus a second bath vanity are brand new, never used upgrades.  Buyers can move right in and enjoy the newness and  cleanliness of this great home. Cooper Commons is an amazing master planned community with miles of biking and walking trails, sport courts and playground.

Public Remarks: Home, sweet home! Fabulous single-story home in the desirable Santa Maria Community is now on the market. This property features 2-car garage, an easy-care landscape, and stone accents. Captivating interior boasts a welcoming great room with soothing palette, neutral tile flooring, and recessed lighting throughout. Stunning kitchen offers ample cabinetry w/crown moulding, sparkling SS appliances, granite counters, a pantry, and a center island w/a breakfast bar. End your busy day in the main bedroom that includes a lavish ensuite w/dual sinks and a walk-in closet. This residence is conveniently located near the downtown Chandler area, Chandler Fashion Center, San Marcos Golf Course, and many outdoor recreational areas! Ask your agent for walkthrough video and what is needed to secure this!
Private Rmks - DND2: Seller is allowing showings on Sat 3/19 from 1pm-2:30pm. I sell 50% of the homes I list before that Sat showing. Ask me for walkthrough videos so your client can get a solid feel for the layout of the home and feel comfortable making an offer before the Sat showing. Offer can be conditional upon a walkthrough approval by the Buyer within 24 hours so NO RISK to your buyer! GOLDEN OPPORTUNITY!!
Directions: Head east, Exit the traffic circle onto E Chandler Blvd, Turn left onto N Superstition Blvd, to E Detroit St, to N Senate St to E Binner Dr, Property will be on the left.

Public Remarks: Located in Valencia II, this T.W. Lewis craftsman-style home personifies casual elegance at its best! Offering four bedrooms and 2.5 baths in the gated enclave of Pontevedra, the home has been meticulously decorated and appointed and the yard's landscape/hardscape has been expertly curated, lighted and irrigated. This quiet community provides numerous walking trails, lakes and fountains, and playground equipment and a ramada suitable for picnics. The greenbelt across the street is also ideal for family gatherings and Carlson Elementary School is within walking distance. As you arrive the home Greets you with Great curb appeal including a Gated front COURTYARD that sets the ambience to the dramatic foyer with 12' ceilings & open formal living space w/views right out to the gorgeous, MORE!!!

Public Remarks: 6 Bedrm/3 Bath N/S facing BASEMENT home in sought after PINELAKE ESTATES! Almost 3,800 sq. ft. w/a HUGE 14,570 cul-de-sac lot. LRG open kitchen w/granite countertops, center island/bar, & plenty of 42'' staggered cabinets, breakfast area, gas cook-top & wall Oven/Microwave. Family rm boasts gas stackstone f/p w/large picture windows t/o. Grand Master Suite w/ views of backyard & private exit. Spa-like en-suite bathrm w/snail shower, elevated separate vanities, & HUGE walk-in closet. OPEN Living Rm & Formal Din Rm - 8' doors t/o & 9+' ceilings. Cabinets + a utility sink in the laundry room. Optional gas/electric dryer hookup. Theater set up in the basement + 2bed/1 bathroom. Covered Patio w/a sparkling pool & raised spill over heated spa. Putting green w/a mix of desert landscaping.

Public Remarks: Beautiful single level home in the heart of Chandler. Open floor plan with huge living and dining, vaulted ceiling, upgraded wood plank tile flooring, upgraded light fixtures, and fireplace in the family room. Trendy WHITE kitchen cabinets with designer handles matching the black diamond granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, mosaic full backsplash, RO, island, and walk-in-pantry. Two-tone paints, ceiling fans, and blinds everywhere. Spacious master suite, 3 guest bedrooms plus a bonus room. Washer and dryer included. Matured backyard with a fenced pool. Quiet cul-de-sac easy walking to Gila Spring fountains, green belts, and lakes. Close to everything, library, restaurants, Chandler fashion mall, medical clinics, banks, grocery, Costco, Walmart. Easy access to I-10, 101, 202.

Public Remarks: Wow, just wow! A gorgeous 2-story residence in the desirable Community of Sun Groves is now on the market! The captivating interior boasts a traditional floor plan w/neutral tile floors, trending palette, plantation shutters, and striking light fixtures. The gorgeous kitchen offers ample white cabinets, sparkling SS appliances, a breakfast room, and granite counters. The sizable den is ideal for an office or extra bedroom! End your busy day in the primary bedroom featuring plush carpet, an upscale ensuite w/dual sinks, and a walk-in closet. Public Remarks: Prepare to have your breath taken away with this gorgeous 4 bedroom 2.5 bath home in the heart of Chandler. You'll love the large loft, high vaulted ceilings, open kitchen with plenty of storage, and spacious bedrooms including the downstairs master! Step outside to enjoy the built in BBQ, HUGE backyard, and private fenced pool / spa. This home is ideally located in the highly sought after Kyrene school district and a close drive to Intel. With easy access to the 101, 10, and 202 - this home is perfectly placed and won't last long. Come tour this house today and make it your new home!

Public Remarks: Location is everything!! Check out this beautiful, updated & well taken care of home in the highly sought after community of Clemente Ranch in Chandler. This 3 bed, 2 bath home, situated in large cul-de-sac features updated flooring, newer interior/exterior paint, updated kitchen cabinets, granite countertops, remodeled bath & open floorplan w/ lots of natural light. A pebble tec pool will greet you out back w/ space to entertain, artificial turf and large patio space. This home has been well maintained and is move-in ready. Location is minutes from 202 freeway, Price Corridor, major Chandler businesses, schools, parks, walking paths, shopping, entertainment & restaurants. Come look before it's gone!

Legal Description (Abbrev): S2 S2 SW4 NW4 EX S 20F & EX W 33F RD
Public Remarks: A Cowboys paradise, custom property on 9+ acres was built in 1998 and has maintained with nothing but love and functionality in mind.  It has it all!  The main house is situated for gorgeous views from every room and displays old western charm from fixtures to fans to a one of a kind entry.  The split floor plan contains a large master suite, tranquil soaking tub, 2 oversized closets.  2 additional bedrooms with full baths, an office, and 1/2 bath surround the large family room and formal dining area.  The kitchen is top notch with granite, Viking professional appliances, Scotsman ice maker, 2 convection ovens, and an abundance of storage.  Beautiful hardwood flooring and custom cabinets and doors are on display throughout the entire home.

Public Remarks: Beautiful South Chandler home on half an acre in a highly desired, gated community, Santan Vista. Chefs kitchen positioned in the center of the home, with upgraded granite countertops, top of the line stainless appliances, gas stove & knotty alder cabinets. Large primary suite with walk-in shower, garden tub, double sink vanity & walk-in closet. Two other large bedrooms are split by Jack-n-Jill bath. Large open office could be a 4th bedroom. Spacious family room. Formal living and dining rooms.  Huge backyard, with extended length, covered patio. Built in BBQ area. Diving pool and spa with black pebble tec. Large grass pad and additional parking area behind RV Gate. Plenty of space to build a casita or workshop. Oversized 3 car garage with additional parking. 2x6 construction

Public Remarks: Your Dream Home awaits!  This beautiful home is located on amazing oversized lot with tons of privacy and room to roam. Sparkling saltwater pool and exquisite landscaping invite you to enjoy the comfort of your own tropic oasis just steps away from your back door. Home features full bedroom and bathroom downstairs great for guests to enjoy privacy. Open spacious Kitchen with granite counter tops, stainless appliances, pantry, and best of all gas cook top make this an entertainers dream.  Upstairs features a  loft w/bonus room, office/den, closets w/built-ins, huge primary suite and on suite bathroom with separate tub and shower and walk in closet. Three car garage and R.V. gate make it easy to store all your toys.  The home shows pride in ownership throughout and is a must see!
