Public Remarks: Welcome Home!!! This Gorgeous 2 bedroom 2 bath home on the golf course at the desirable 55+ community of Sunbird in Chandler is in a fantastic location. Close to restaurants, shopping, parks, multiple golf courses & easy access to the I-10 Fwy. As soon as you step into this home, you can see the Pride of Ownership with all that has been done. This elegant kitchen offers stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, filtered water & lots of cabinet space for storage & organization. Your spacious master suite offers a plethora of natural light, a walk in closet, dual vanity & stand alone shower, as well as direct access to your back patio. Your low maintenance backyard offers a covered patio, extended pavers & a fantastic view out onto the golf course. This home also offers a a new roof

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 40 LAKESIDE SHORES 2 LOT 1-52 TR A-H PUT ST MCR 029736
Public Remarks: Awesome opportunity to own this 3 bedroom, 2 bath Chandler home in the quiet community of Lakeside Shores!  Vaulted ceilings and a great room layout make this home feel light and bright.  Large ceramic tile throughout with wood floors in the bedrooms (NO carpet!).  The kitchen has travertine countertops and maple cabinets w/crown molding and extra cabinets/storage with a wine rack off of the dining space.  Large master bedroom offers two his and hers walk in closets and an en-suite bathroom with an oversized travertine walk in shower.  The garage has convenient built in cabinets and home is also plumbed for a water softener. The low maintenance back yard is perfect for entertaining with a pavered patio and artificial turf. As a huge bonus the locked privacy back gate offers direct access

Public Remarks: Beautiful single family home loaded with upgrades inside and out! The back is perfect for entertaining and includes a sparkling private pool, artificial turf, a built in BBQ island w/ granite countertops and fridge! The home has new Andersen windows throughout, new pool equipment, new HVAC and heating unit and more (See full list in docs tab). The kitchen has been fully remodeled with new stainless steel appliances, upgraded cabinetry and granite countertops. The home has plantation shutters, high vaulted ceilings, upgraded fixtures throughout and more! Located in a non-HOA community, is nearby multiple parks (Tibshraeny Family Park, Pima Park and Jackrabbit Park), BASIS Chandler School, and is minutes from Downtown Chandler which has tons of shops, restaurants, and more

Public Remarks: Zoned agricultural, this property that is currently housing a business can be used as single family housing with horse privileges!  Situated on approximately 3/4 of an acre and backing to the canal, this home has lots of potential for multiple uses.  The structure features a kitchen, living room, fireplace, 2 bedrooms, a bonus room, and 1 full bathroom. A second bathroom was converted to an office, but plumbing is present to make this space a bathroom again.   Flood irrigation is available. Property is currently on septic, but may be connected to the sewer near by.  This property is also listed as a commercial listing - MLS # 6349773

Public Remarks: You and your family will love this stunning 3 bedroom, 2 bath home with a den on a quiet street next to a lush greenbelt. There's an RV gate for your boat, too. Cook in your Gourmet Kitchen that boasts of two ovens, stainless steel appliances, including a newer refrigerator, granite counter tops, ample cabinetry with elegant crown molding, tile backsplash, recessed lighting, an island with a breakfast bar, & R/O System. You'll discover great architectural lines in the formal dining room, large great room with a cozy fireplace, neutral paint throughout, and classy tile floors. The Main bedroom includes a bath with an exquisite tiled step-in shower, dual sinks, and a custom walk-in closet w/built-ins. Have parties on your covered patio with extended pavers and shade trees for cooler summers.

Public Remarks: One of the best original neighborhoods in all of Chandler! Quality Peden built home that has been meticulously maintained. The home has 3 bedrooms, a double door den (that could be used as a 4th bedroom) and a small mini office. The secondary bedrooms are extra big. The home has been updated & the decorations are on point. Nice granite counter tops & stainless steel appliances. Beautiful brick fireplace, ceiling fans, & storage galore - closets everywhere! Good size master bedroom , bath & walk-in closet. Home sits on about a 1/4 acre lot w/ beautiful green grass - ready to play on! Large storage room off back patio, & home has an RV Gate with a 220 volt plugin at the RV parking area. This is a great home in a fantastic neighborhood!  Just a block away from top rated Knox Gifted Academy.

Public Remarks: Hurry to see this move-in ready, CORNER lot home in desirable Chandler! Conveniently located near shopping, dining, & freeways. It offers a 2 car split garage w/floor to ceiling attached cabinets, openers, with one 3 ft. longer. Airy and light open floor plan features gorgeous natural lighting, neutral paint, tile flooring t/out for easy maintenance, & awesome glass back patio door access great for entertaining. Freshly painted inside and out. Cultured stone accent. The open kitchen comes complete w/SS appliances, recessed lighting, ample wood cabinetry/counter space. Main bedroom boasts a pristine en suite with a soaking tub/shower combo, & walk-in closet. Outback, you'll love the serene yard, extended paver patio, & synthetic grass area. Public Remarks: You'll fall in love with this move-in ready WATERFRONT beauty! Spacious 4 bedroom, 2.5 bath home with vaulted ceilings, with a great room floorplan, a HUGE lush backyard with diving pool and extended patio, RV gate and side yard storage area. Enjoy sunsets on the patio down by the lake or ride around in your own paddleboat! Located on a corner lot in the highly desirable lake/golf community of Ocotillo, with highly rated Chandler schools within walking distance, and coffee shops and restaurants across the block! Meticulously maintained with NEW roof in 2020, NEW AC units in 2020, NEW RO and water softener in 2021, NEW exterior paint in 2021, master bathroom remodeled in 2020. This is the one you've been waiting for! Check it out today!

WINDOWS have all been upgraded and AC was replaced in 2017. Also NO HOA. Don't miss this little GEM!

Public Remarks: Rare highly updated house in the high demand Lake community of Oakwood Lakes. This energy efficient house boasts 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 3 car garage with a unique 346 sqft permitted attached office or workshop complete with its own heating and cooling. Property is situated on a private over 1/4-acre cul-de-sac lot. Upgrades include triple pane windows to block noise and heat, shutters on all windows, granite countertops, wide baseboards, polished stone and engineered wood flooring, upgraded front door, pavers in patio with siding ceiling and seamless gutters, list goes on and on. Community is located close to Intel, Wells Fargo, Northrop Grumman and many other employers, shopping, schools and freeways.

Public Remarks: Stunning 4 BR 2 BA 1960 sq ft single level home w/tons of upgrades & a backyard paradise. Such appeal & warmth from LR, DR, & KIT to Great Rm w/custom built-ins incl FRPL, lighting, 70'' TV & single French door to back yd. New AC & gas heater 2017, ext paint 2019, garbage disposal & water heater 2021. Located near Chandler mall, freeway, hospital, shopping, restaurants & more. Won't last long!

Master bedroom has separate jetted tub and shower, make up counter, double sinks and large walk in closet. Gourmet kitchen includes granite counters, double gas ovens, 5 burner gas stove, soft close drawers & cabinets, extended counter/cabinets, & large walk in pantry. Large 28x10 extended covered patio. Layton Lakes master planned community includes a splash pad, parks, community lake, walking trails & more. Easy access to 202 and Santan Village shopping/dining area.

Public Remarks: You'll LOVE this gorgeous 4 bed, 2.5 bath home in the desirable Southshore Village! Enjoy your entertainer's backyard boasting a relaxing covered patio, travertine tiles, artificial turf and a travertine seating area. Discover a formal living room, bright family room, multi-sliding door to the backyard oasis. Upgraded flooring in formal and living room. Upgraded kitchen with granite counter-tops, stainless-steel appliances, double-ovens, 5-burner gas cook top, large island & breakfast nook. Laundry room with built-in cabinets. Finished 3-car garage has epoxy flooring & custom closets. Excellent location near Basis South & Hamilton High school!

Kitchen features stainless steel appliances, maple cabinetry, quartz countertops, and breakfast room with natural light. Master suite features walk in closet, separate tub/shower, and his/her sinks. Super private backyard and offers lush, green landscaping & patio to enjoy those cool summer nights along with a fenced play pool for summer fun! Public Remarks: 3 bed 2.5 bath 2 story home w/ a loft & a pool in pristine condition. New roof w/ a 30-year warranty! Premium lot w/ no neighbors across the street. Formal living & dining area. Kitchen is open to the family & has granite counters, stone backsplash, newer stainless steel appliances, island w/ lighting above & a pantry. Family room is oversized w/ a fireplace. The primary suite is oversized w/ a walk-in closet & a newly remodeled bathroom. Dual sink vanity w/ quartz counters, walk-in shower has a tile surround w/ a mosaic deco-band. Large resort-style backyard has a tiled covered patio, pool w/ new cool deck & removable pool fencing, and a sophisticated Rachio watering system that compensates for rain levels. Walking distance to the park. 101 & Whole Foods plaza is less than 1 mile away.

Public Remarks: Beautiful remodel with Soaring ceilings, wood plank tiled floors, floor to ceiling fireplace accent wall, and welcoming palette with many designer touches. Stunning new kitchen features a center island, quartz counters, SS appliances,decorative tiled backsplash, lovely dining area w/patio access & upgraded lighting. Fabulous laundry mud room w/chalkboard, coat hooks, bench with designed shiplap & folding table. Upscale baths w/granite counters, designer tile, mirrors & brushed nickel fixtures. Master retreat offers private en-suite w/dual sinks, adorable tile in shades of blue. Large lot with RV gate, tons of space to play as well as a big plumbed garden! Newer roof, gates, sprinkler/drip system, newer AC, new windows.  NO HOA!!

Public Remarks: Welcome to this impressive 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home in the sought-after Sienna Heights Community! The covered front entry invites you into this light-filled main living area with delightful character. Enjoy cooking in this gorgeous kitchen boasting warm cabinets, ample countertop space, and an island opening to the breakfast area, and a cozy living room. Relax in your primary suite, complete with an enter-in closet, and an en suite bathroom with double sinks and a soaking tub. Entertain your guests outside on this covered patio and private fenced-in yard. This home is minutes to parks, restaurants, and more!

Public Remarks: COMING SOON! Great 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home with convenience to the San Tan Mall, the 202 & the 101 freeway. This home features vaulted ceilings that create a light & bright atmosphere. The recently remodeled kitchen (2018) features newer 42 inch custom cabinets with soft closing drawers and cabinet doors, granite countertops, custom kitchen island with walnut butcher box countertop and built in trash and recycling, and newer appliances (2018). On a bright and sunny day, relax on the patio in this well-maintained backyard. You'll be able to find additional overhead built-in storage in garage. This home is also a short walk to the community park with children's playground and basketball court and also Sanborn Elementary School. Professional photos to come...

Public Remarks: Spectacular open floorplan ranch in desirable Sunbird Adult community. This home has been updated on the interior and is move in ready! Large open kitchen with breakfast bar and eat in dining area, as well as formal dining. Kitchen features new granite countertops and new stainless steel appliances. The generous family room is centered around the updated tiled wood-burning fireplace. Split floorplan with the owners suite in the rear of the home has been updated with dual sink vanity and new hardware. The large walk in closet will surely impress. 2 secondary bedrooms share the updated hall bath featuring neutral finishes and new vanity. Timeless modern home with desired floorplan, come view today before it's gone!

Public Remarks: Quaint, cozy and no HOA!  With vaulted ceilings and a plethora of NEW windows, this home has all the light and bright vibes you are looking for!  This efficient floorplan allows for a spacious family room that you will be comfortable binge watching your favorite series or enjoy time entertaining family/friends.  Mosey to the backyard where you'll find a plenty of privacy with space to barbecue, play fetch w/Fido, meditate or even sunbathe in your birthday suit if you wish, as there are no two levels peering in your backyard.  A raised garden bed is awaiting your green thumb so you can have all the ''garden bed to table'' meals on the daily!  Ideally situated within 2 miles to Loop 202 access, 1.5 miles to downtown Chandler, 5 miles to San Tan Village and 6.5 miles to downtown Gilbert

Public Remarks: Sprawling T.W. Lewis ranch, nestled on 18,000 sq ft lot w/access 101 and 202 fwys, 5 BR, 5 full baths, 3G, & est 3127 sq ft. Park 8 cars on drvway. Public Remarks: Looking for a home on a large over  acre irrigated lot, with horse privileges & no HOA? You have found it in the sought after Ranchos De Chandler neighborhood. Home has 3 bedrooms & 2 bathrooms, formal dining area, inside laundry, plus a HUGE BONUS ROOM. Newer tile flooring in main living areas.The kitchen has updated granite countertops, bay window seating area viewing backyard. Formal dining area & living room with wood burning fireplace &  Arcadia doors leading to the backyard. Spacious floor plan, dual pane windows & plenty of natural light. Irrigated yard with mature trees including citrus, block wall fencing, plenty of room for gardening, animals, & toys. Two car garage with ample exterior storage. Close to downtown Chandler, shopping, restaurants, and freeway. Come see it today!

Public Remarks: This single-story, 3 bedroom 2 bathroom Chandler home is ready for its new owner! You will love the high vaulted ceilings and spacious Great Room perfect for entertaining - ceiling fans are also featured throughout the home. Kitchen offers eat-in dining that opens up to the main living spaces. Primary bedroom is ensuite with a full bathroom. The backyard is easy to maintain with classic desert landscaping. Located in an excellent neighborhood with convenient access to amenities including shopping, dining and easy 101 highway access. Families will love the high quality Kyrene School District, as well as neighborhood greenbelt in walking or biking distance, or playing at nearby Desert Breeze park!

Public Remarks: Rare opportunity to own a beautiful home in Sienna Heights with OWNED Solar and situated perfectly on a North South facing lot.  This 4 bedroom home also has a loft and a downstairs office.  Community has a large central situated park, with lots of space for activities.  Home is situated forward on the lot to make the most of the huge backyard and pool.  This well maintained and upgraded home is hard to find in the area. Close to shopping, schools, dining and freeways, don't miss this one!
Private Rmks - DND2: Dog will be removed for showings. CBS code will be provided with appointment confirmation.  Do not be early or late, dog needs to be removed or kenneled at appointment time.  Owned Solar is an easy $30 transfer fee to SRP.  Open house Friday and Saturday is best time to show.  Please see document section for all docs. Prelist inspection done & all repairs completed. Please get your own inspection.
Directions: Germann to Holguin at Sienna Heights Entrance (half way between Alma School & AZ Ave). Then R. on Weatherby, L. on Iowa, L/ on Musket, R. on Holguin, R. on Thompson Pl to home.

This beautiful Forte custom home has 4,513 sq ft on one level w/ private 3,762 sq ft air conditioned airplane hangar that taxis right onto the Stellar runway, retractable batting cage, bar, and basketball court is the ultimate man cave. The kitchen is appointed with Subzero/Wolf appliances including Built in espresso maker, dual Cove Dishwashers and dinning space has built in Subzero Wine Fridge. 3 car gar, outdoor kitchen w/ pizza oven, heated Pool, Jacuzzi, fireplace. This  exquisite home features dual Master Bedrooms, Guest Suite, Formal Office and Gameroom. The open floor plan has 18' ceilings with floating box beam ceiling treatments. Towering gas linear fireplace in the main room is the center piece of the living area.

No showings while home is occupied.

Public Remarks: Lovingly maintained home on premium corner lot with great room layout, vaulted ceilings throughout, and two master suites.  Second master was added in 2005 complete with sitting area, exit to the front courtyard and fantastic walk-in closet plus two sinks and oversized shower.  Other master bedroom and great room have beautiful wood flooring.  Backyard has grassy play area, several mature trees for shade in the south-facing backyard and two covered patios.  Two-car garage has direct entrance to the house and the laundry is inside rather than in the garage.  Please note tax records are not correct with regard to the size of the room addition.

Bedroom w/ separate exit to back patio. Separate shower/tub + double sinks. Double patio for all of your BBQ's. Multiple A/C units.  Full 3C-garage w/ a 4' extension + garage cabinets.

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 156 VILLAGE AT TIBURON UNIT 3 MCR 026704
Public Remarks: Rare single-level 5 bdrm 3 full bath beautiful home with pool.  Vaulted great room as you enter, w/stained concrete floors & versatile front room perfect for an office.  Home features  spacious kitchen w/custom curved island & dining area big enough to seat 12. Kitchen has a bay window seat, window views of pool and yard, natural light, custom white cabinets w/glass door uppers,  stainless appliances, slab granite countertops & backsplash.  Anderson french doors to a lushly landscaped backyard w/covered patio w/ grape vines, additional gazebo for a BBQ area, diving pool and citrus.  Split 2 master suites both w/ lovely walk-in showers, dual sinks, walk-in closets & separate exits to the patios.  New A/C's in 2016 and 2018.  Full new roof only 4 years old.  Walk to park & playground
Private Rmks - DND2: Lock box on water main to left of door.    Thank you for showing!  Back main room was class room and still has pets in it please be aware.  Black out window coverings do not convey.  Closet doors for kids rooms are in garage and can be put back on.  Swing set can be removed.
Directions: Head West to Mission Park Blvd. N on Mission Park Blvd, E on Coronado, E on Calle del Norte, N on Ellis.

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 10 OCOTILLO LAKES PARCEL D2 FINAL PLAT MCR 047416
Public Remarks: Beautiful & spacious single-story in Ocotillo Lakes! Tall ceilings and with great sized rooms. Tons of natural light make this house feel like home. Welcoming entryway functions as a sitting or formal dining space. Kitchen with island, stainless steel appliances and eat-in kitchen opens up to the living. room.  Primary bedroom is ensuite with a full bathroom including glass walk-in shower and dual sinks. Big open lot is premium for this home, with paved built-in BBQ area, grassy spaces, mature tree landscaping and of course a gorgeous pool with water feature. Covered patio with ceiling fan is perfect to dine al fresco! Don't forget the 3 car garage - this home is calling your name!

Public Remarks: Meticulously maintained home in beautiful Redwood Estates - Chandler.  This is a true split, 4 bedroom, 3 full bath home with an office that could also be used as formal dining.  Custom StoneCreek gourmet kitchen remodel in 2018.   Kitchen features 42'' white shaker cabinets,  accent color at island,  quartz countertops, ceramic backsplash, granite composite sink, stainless steel appliances, and designated space for wine fridge.  All bathrooms feature raised vanities, quartz countertops and undermount sinks.  Plantation shutters, vaulted ceilings, all new fans and fixtures, neutral paint and tile throughout this home.  Beautiful cabinets with granite countertops and epoxy floors in garage with brand new water heater and a one year old water softener.
Private Rmks - DND2: Multiple offers received.  Please give Sellers a response time of Monday, February 21 at noon as one of the parties is traveling and unable to connect until Sunday evening to review offers. Thank you in advance!

Public Remarks: Looking for a new home? This beautiful 2 bed, 2 bath residence nestled on a corner lot is the perfect one for you! Offering a 2 car garage and easy-care landscape w/mature trees in the front yard. Enter to discover a welcoming great room, designer paint, sliding doors to the back, tons of natural light, and tile floors w/plush carpet in bedrooms. The kitchen boasts built-in appliances, a walk-in pantry, Corian counters, ample cabinetry, and a 2 tier island. Main bedroom has an ensuite with dual sinks & a walk-in closet. Double-door den can be an office or 3rd bedroom as well. Check out the spacious backyard featuring a relaxing covered patio and space for enjoying BBQ! Don't forget the Cooper Commons amenities, including a pool, sports courts, & a large playground! This gem is a must-see!

Public Remarks: WOW! Welcome to this beautiful LAKEFRONT, split floor plan home that sits on one of the largest corner lots in the highly desirable Pecos Ranch community! The very low HOA includes awesome amenities such as tennis courts, a children's playground, walking and biking paths and so much more! The home was just painted inside and out, including the garage door...There's also a newer AC unit! The kitchen offers plenty of countertop space for meal prep or entertaining and looks out to the water...The office already has closet space which could be easily converted into a third bedroom! The large master suite has direct access to the HUGE backyard, and the secondary bedroom is the perfect size for kids or guests...Enjoy FISHING OFF THE DOCK! You'll also be able to park your boat alongside it...

Public Remarks: PLUS PLUS PLUS! This newly renovated Old Stone Ranch home has it all! 4 bedrooms, PLUS den, PLUS loft, and TONS of storage. The AMAZING cul-de-sac lot is surrounded by green belts and walking paths to award winning schools and Citrus Vista Park. The backyard OASIS features a large heated play pool (w swim up bar and therapy jets), sunken patio with TV nook,  gas fireplace and gorgeous fire features. HUGE side yard can be used as a RECREATION area or to STORE your toys.  The GORGEOUS interior includes CUSTOM solid wood barn doors, wood-look  tile/LVP, custom light fixtures, granite and Upgraded structured wiring (perfect for working from home).  This BEAUTY really does have it ALL!!   Owner/Agent

Public Remarks: The search is finally over! Charming 3 bed, 2 bath property in Joshua Village is the one you're looking for! Outside of home just painted and a new patio roof. Inside, you will find an impressive living/dining area showcasing neutral palette, engineered wood flooring, vaulted ceilings, arched doorways, & a fabulous fireplace great for enjoying on chilly evenings. The newer immaculate kitchen offers plenty of espresso cabinets, granite counters, track lighting, a pantry, & a cozy breakfast nook. Spacious main bedroom features a private bathroom with granite dual sinks & a walk-in closet. Discover the easy-care backyard with covered patio perfect for relaxing on your day off along with a glass of wine! You don't want to miss this fantastic opportunity! Call to schedule a showing today!

Public Remarks: Come see this Beautiful well maintained Home in Autumn Park, By Fulton Homes. This home offers just under 2400 sq.ft with 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms (one tub in main) and a tandem 3 car garage. It has a beautiful Kitchen with large island and open concept, great for entertaining. Enter the front door with a bedroom (currently being used as office/has closet) to the left and bath to the right. Then enter into formal living and dining area with it's own outdoor patio, another great area for entertaining. Backyard is low maintenance with some citrus trees to enjoy. This Home is at the back of the subdivision (so very little traffic) and backs to canal, which is perfect for the active person. This is a must see, your Buyer won't be disappointed. Thank you.

Lovely eat-in kitchen showcases SS appliances, white cabinets, tile backsplash, granite counters, recessed lighting, a breakfast bar, & pantry. Take advantage of the Community facilities, including pool, tennis courts, & much more.

Public Remarks: ADORABLE remodel with loads of updates  in a fabulous location! Love the open floor plan with soaring ceilings & stylish light fixtures. Beautiful luxury vinyl plank floors, tall baseboards & fresh paint set the stage. The kitchen wall was opened up, updated cabinetry has stylish hardware & is topped off with gorgeous quartz counters. The great room is huge with a focal point of the newly designed fireplace with a granite hearth. French doors were installed for back yard access. All the bedrooms are roomy! The private owner's suite has its own exit to the back yard & has separation from the secondary bedrooms. Its bathroom has a separate shower & tub, newer cabinets, & quartz counters. The walk-in closet has tons of space. The low maintenance back yard includes a soothing inground spa.

Public Remarks: Beautiful single family home in the gated community of Haven in the heart of Chandler. Rare, gated neighborhood with quick access to freeway and downtown Chandler. Low maintenance with perfect north and south exposure corner lot. This home features Den and 3 large bedrooms all with walk-in closets including an oversized master bedroom. 2 Full baths & 1 half bath. Den/office downstairs is great for online meetings or online school sessions. Open floor plan with upgraded tile in all the right places. Kitchen/island overlooking Family Room, Huge Island with granite counters, walk-in pantry, and gas appliances. Amazing cabinet storage with high ceilings throughout with lots of windows and sliding doors. Interior includes 10' ceilings on 1st floor and 9' ceilings on 2nd floor and all 8' doors .

Public Remarks: HUGE basement home on a corner lot in the heart of Chandler! Upon entering you'll notice the stone-accented two-way fireplace, neutral palette, plantation shutters, and vaulted ceilings. Create gourmet dishes in the remodeled kitchen equipped with SS appliances, an island w/extra prep sink, a walk-in pantry, and staggered cherry cabinets. In the basement you'll discover huge bonus/game rooms on either side of the stairs, and an additional fireplace. The owner's suite is upstairs for extra privacy and has separate access to the backyard, walk-in closet, and a beautiful upgraded bathroom. Enjoy game nights in the basement, take the kids out to meet some friends in this family-friendly neighborhood, or take a 10-minute walk to Arrowhead pool and park. BONUS: newer roof and windows.
Private Rmks - DND2: Ignore tax records square footage. About 2,300 sq ft upstairs and about 1,900 downstairs.

Public Remarks: Rare Find - Beautiful home meticulously maintained by original owner! Popular split bedroom floor plan on a  premium N/S facing lot that backs to a greenbelt; privacy all around, has single level homes on either side. Ample Owner's suite adjacent to a private bath with oval soaking tub, shower stall and double sinks. Large walk in closet with built ins. Newer fixtures throughout. Designer features throughout.  Immaculate garage with built in storage, finished flooring and tool organizers. Coveted location in West Chandler near freeways, Intel, Schools, lots of shopping, dining, entertainment.  Homes of this caliber sell quickly!

Public Remarks: Introducing you to a 4 bed, 2 bath completely updated home located on an oversize pie-shaped lot!! The beautiful layout is comprised of Saltillo tile flooring throughout, vaulted ceilings, formal dining, great room, & plantation shutters on every new dual pane window throughout. Create gourmet recipes in the chef's kitchen delight including SS appliances, granite counters, maple Thomasville soft close cabinets w/ pull out drawers, built in trash bins, & a large breakfast bar. The charming main bedroom offers soft carpet and a gorgeous ensuite with dual sinks, a floor-to-ceiling tiled shower, & a walk-in closet. Oversize dual slider looks out to the huge backyard, perfect for fun gatherings, with it's fenced blue pebbletec pool, lush grass, shade trees, & large covered patio.

Public Remarks: Gorgeous farmhouse on over an acre of county land with NO HOA! Gourmet kitchen boasts custom ceiling height cabinetry, double ovens, leathered granite countertops, and oversized island. Beautiful great room with rustic wood ceiling beams, large windows, and sliding glass door to huge exterior living space with TV for entertaining. Generous sized master bedroom features a large walk-in closet, private exit to back patio, and stunning spa-like master bath with glass multi-head shower and free-standing soaking tub. Convenient office/library with high speed fiber optic Cox internet, perfect for remote work! 3 guest bedrooms with large closets (2 have walk-ins) and one with private bath. Complete remodel throughout the home including wood-look tile, light fixtures and fans, insulated garage

Public Remarks: Your search is over! This beautiful property in Chandler is now for sale! This astonishing home features a lush grass front yard, a 2 car garage, and charming stone accented faade. You will love the spacious living areas that flow from one space to another great for entertaining. High ceilings, formal living & dining room upon entry, open ceiling family room, carpet flooring t/out, and lots of gorgeous natural lighting. The kitchen offers well-kept appliances, & tons of wood cabinetry/counter space. Large main bedroom upstairs has a lavish bath with a separate tub, step-in shower, dual sinks, & a walk-in closet. The backyard is a delight with its extended covered patio, large sparkling pool w/soothing waterfall, & a firepit seating area. Don't waste time! Take a tour now before it's gone!

Shopping, restaurants and easy access to freeways.

The home is located right across the street of a Manicured and shady park with conveniently located additional parking.

Public Remarks: Get ready to fall in love with this rare basement home in Ashley Park! Excellent corner lot location next to a green common area! This gem features a low-maintenance desert landscape & a 3 car garage w/extended driveway for all your cars. As you enter, you'll notice the charming den/office & the delightful great room where you can entertain your guests. Create culinary desserts in the eat-in kitchen, which is fully equipped & showcases a center island w/breakfast bar & plenty of cabinets. Off to the kitchen, you'll find the cozy family room boasting a gas fireplace perfect for the cooler months. The main bedroom is split & has its own bathroom. Downstairs, you'll discover a large basement providing endless possibilities of entertainment. Backyard offers a pool & built-in BBQ. Must see!!

Public Remarks: Gorgeous home in the desirable Community of Lantana Ranch situated on a corner lot.  Spacious open floor plan, handsome wood look tile floors, trending palette, ceiling fans, recessed lighting, & window blinds. Stunning chef's kitchen features a large center island, granite counters, subway tile backsplash, SS appliances, breakfast bar, & plethora of grey cabinets.  Patio access from the dining area w/upgraded lighting. Bay window in the primary bedroom, plush carpet, private upscale en suite w/dual sinks, granite counter, & a walk-in closet. Enjoy the backyard lush green landscape, covered patio, shade trees, & room for a pool!  Will not disappoint!
